lead_paragraph: LUTFY--Isabel, passed away peacefully early on June 23rd at age 92. Devoted wife of the late Edmund R. Lutfy, beloved mother of James, Jeanne and Carol. Proud grandmother of Michael, Christopher, Stephen, Daniel, Mick and Ketsara. Loving mother-in-law to Pat, Henk-Jan and Andy. Daughter of Richard and Wadia Haboush, Isabel was born in Brooklyn Heights and grew up in Bay Ridge. As the family matriarch, Isabel presided over family events and holiday meals for decades, her Lebanese cooking renown. Isabel was a voracious reader, masterful bridge player, and avid politico, who was passionate about everything New York. She also loved to dance, especially in Cape May, NJ where she spent summers for most of her life. Isabel was beloved by her children, siblings, nieces, nephews, grandchildren and a host of dear friends. She will be greatly missed. A funeral service will be held at Church of the Virgin Mary in Park Slope on Saturday, June 25th at 10:00am. Donations can be made to Church of the Virgin Mary, 216 8th Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11215. 1/3
